summary: Cloud Engineer with expertise in designing, implementing, and managing scalable cloud infrastructure. Experienced in multi-cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), Infrastructure as Code, DevOps practices, and cloud-native application deployment. Strong background in automation, monitoring, and security best practices.

experience.title: Senior Cloud Engineer
experience.description: Design and manage cloud infrastructure for high-traffic applications across AWS and GCP
achievements: Architected multi-region cloud infrastructure supporting 1M+ daily active users
Reduced infrastructure costs by 45% through right-sizing and reserved instance optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
Achieved 99.99% uptime through automated monitoring and self-healing systems
Led migration from on-premises to cloud, completing 200+ services migration

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
experience.description: Automated deployment processes and managed containerized applications in cloud environments
achievements: Built automated CI/CD pipelines for 50+ microservices using GitLab CI
Implemented Infrastructure as Code reducing provisioning time by 80%
Set up comprehensive monitoring and alerting reducing incident response time by 60%
Orchestrated Kubernetes clusters managing 200+ pods across multiple environments

experience.title: Cloud Infrastructure Specialist
experience.description: Managed cloud infrastructure and implemented automation for development and production environments
achievements: Migrated legacy applications to cloud-native architecture
Implemented backup and disaster recovery procedures achieving RTO < 1 hour
Automated infrastructure provisioning reducing manual effort by 70%
Established security best practices and compliance frameworks

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Platform
projects.description: Built unified platform for managing resources across AWS, GCP, and Azure
achievements: Created unified API for provisioning resources across 3 cloud providers
Implemented cost optimization algorithms saving 30% on cloud spend
Built disaster recovery system with automatic failover capabilities

projects.name: Kubernetes Operator for ML Workloads
projects.description: Custom Kubernetes operator for managing machine learning training jobs
achievements: Automated ML pipeline deployment reducing setup time by 90%
Implemented auto-scaling for GPU resources based on queue depth
Created monitoring dashboards for ML job performance tracking

projects.name: Infrastructure Monitoring Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive monitoring and alerting system for cloud infrastructure
achievements: Built predictive alerting reducing false positives by 85%
Created custom metrics for business-critical application monitoring
Implemented automated remediation for common infrastructure issues
